Copy "C:\GIS\ArcGIS_Pro\ParkAmenity\ParkAmenity.gdb\ParkAmenity " C:\Users\blacksr\AppData\Roaming\ESRI\ArcGISPro\Favorites\PARKS.sde\parks.parkeditor.ParkAmenity FeatureClass "'Park Name' 'CV domain' 'Park Name_1' #;'Recreation Type' 'CV domain' 'Recreation Type_1' #"

dataIdInfo.idPurp: This dataset identifies the location of all active park (play) amenities in the parks of Mecklenburg County.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: This dataset identifies the location of all active amenities in the parks of Mecklenburg County, managed by Mecklenburg County Parks & Recreation, Town of Huntersville, Town of Cornelius, Town of Davidson, Town of Matthews, Town of Mint Hill, and Town of Pineville.

Consts.useLimit: Although every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of information, errors and conditions originating from physical sources used to develop the corporate database may be reflected in the data supplied. Users of this data must be aware of data conditions and bear responsibility for the appropriate use of the information with respect to possible errors, original map scale, collection methodology,currency of data, and other conditions specific to certain data. Mecklenburg County makes no warranty, either expressed or implied, as to the accuracy or completeness of any information archived and distributed. The digital information is distributed on an "as is" basis, and Mecklenburg County shall not be responsible for any claims attributable to errors, omissions or other inaccuracies in the information. In no event shall Mecklenburg County be liable for direct, indirect, special, incidental or consequential loss or damage of any nature caused to any person, party or entity as a result of use of the information. Mecklenburg County does not support secondary distribution of this data.The use of trade names or commercial products does not constitute their endorsement by Mecklenburg County. Mecklenburg County hereby disclaims liability for any such loss or damage.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Name of a Park or Facility
Recreation Type assigned to each feature
Amenity number assigned to each feature in a unique park
Attribute to group features by a specific type
Approximate age of persons field is designed for play
Can football be played on field
Can Cricket be played on field
Does recreation center have rooms for rent
Amenity managed by park and recreation organization
